rows.label: qst001301_msg0001
rows.name:
*sigh*
What am I gonna do about this...?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, hello there. That's about as big of
a welcome as I can muster right now.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm in a bit of tight spot. At this rate,
my whole trade might be done for!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0005
rows.name:
But I dunno how interested you are in
my problems.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0006
rows.name:
Huh? No, really, it'd bore you to death.
Wait, hang on...are you lot Drivers?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0007
rows.name: Oh, this is a turn-up for the books!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0008
rows.name:
They've been having a bit of problem
with monsters in Gwenith Paddies
lately. They can't harvest the Gromrice.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0009
rows.name:
詳しくは知らねぇが
ヴィルトシュヴァイン傭兵団とやらが
そのモンスター（仮）の天敵を倒しすぎたとか[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst001301_msg0010
rows.name:
But anyhow, that means I can't make
half the items on my menu, 'cos I've
got no Gromrice.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0011
rows.name:
So my business is in a bit of a slump.
I can't really open up till it gets sorted
out.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0012
rows.name:
It's not just a problem for me. I can't
pay my staff. I dunno what they're
going to do.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0013
rows.name:
Well, that's my problem. You lot look
pretty tough, so I thought it was worth
a punt to tell you about it.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0014
rows.name:
Do you reckon you could get it sorted
for us?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0015
rows.name:
Gwenith Paddiesの
モンスター共（仮）を倒してほしいんだ

rows.label: qst001301_msg0016
rows.name: I'll make it worth your while, of course.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0017
rows.name: So, what do you say?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0018
rows.name:
Oh, thank you so much! I really owe
you! Or, I mean, I will, once you've
taken care of it.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0019
rows.name:
All right, well, I'll let you go and sort it
out.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0101
rows.name:
Hey there again. Did you
forget where to go?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0102
rows.name:
俺の依頼は
Gwenith Paddiesで繁殖した
エネミー（仮）の討伐だ

rows.label: qst001301_msg0103
rows.name: Thanks for taking it on!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0201
rows.name: What's up? Did you forget something?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0202
rows.name:
それとも　もうモンスター共（仮）を
倒してきたのか？

rows.label: qst001301_msg0203
rows.name:
Haha! Taking care of that many
monsters in such a short time? The
very thought of it!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0204
rows.name:
Huh? Done already? No.
I don't believe it. Seriously?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0205
rows.name:
Are you sure you aren't fibbing?
I'll find out if you are, y'know!
But wait... If you ARE serious...

rows.label: qst001301_msg0207
rows.name:
Well, I told you I shut up shop
for the moment, yeah?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0208
rows.name:
So, as the guy in charge, I gotta make
sure we don't lose too much cash here.
And wages cost a bunch.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0209
rows.name: So I kind of...don't have any staff left!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0210
rows.name:
I guess I got a bit carried away letting
people go. But I mean, I didn't expect
the problem to clear up so quick!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0211
rows.name:
Been in our family for generations,
this place has. I have to make tough
decisions to keep it afloat sometimes.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0212
rows.name:
Seems like my decision backfired a bit
this time, though.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0213
rows.name: But it's far too soon to give up!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0214
rows.name:
Could you help me out here while I
try and round some staff back up?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0215
rows.name:
Hey, you've helped me this far.
What's a little more, right?
I'll double your reward and everything!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0216
rows.name: You'll help? Thanks a million!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0217
rows.name:
Okay, sorry to be throwin' orders at you
already, but there's this tricky request
just came in from one of my regulars.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0218
rows.name:
I need someone to fetch the
ingredients. Giant Frog Meat
and Fusty Fungus, to be precise.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0219
rows.name:
Fusty Fungus isn't too difficult.
I just order it in from Hræsvelgr usually.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0220
rows.name:
Giant Frog Meat, though...that's
a bit more tricky.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0221
rows.name:
○○○にいる×××を倒せば
手に入るだろう

rows.label: qst001301_msg0222
rows.name:
It's a bit of big ask, but I'm sure you
lot'll be able to sort it out, no problem.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0223
rows.name:
Oh? You'll do it? That's a really big
help to me!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0224
rows.name:
Okay, I'll leave it up to you lot then.
Good luck!

rows.label: qst001302_msg0301
rows.name:
It's not easy, getting staff to come
back after you've let them go...

rows.label: qst001302_msg0302
rows.name:
How you doing with that
Giant Frog Meat and Fusty Fungus?

rows.label: qst001302_msg0303
rows.name:
Fusty Fungus is pretty easy to order
from Hræsvelgr.

rows.label: qst001302_msg0304
rows.name:
Giant Frog Meatは
○○○にいる×××を倒せば
手に入るだろ

rows.label: qst001302_msg0305
rows.name: Good luck with it!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0401
rows.name: Aha! Just who I was hoping to see!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0402
rows.name:
Right, I'll get this dish whipped up
in a jiffy. Could you deliver it when
it's done?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0403
rows.name: There you go! One Salted Brog Sauté!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0404
rows.name:
Ever had it before? The eyes are the
tastiest bit, y'know.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0405
rows.name: What's up? Hungry for something?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0406
rows.name:
Course you are! Must be tough making
deliveries now all this lovely food's got
your taste buds tickled, eh?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0407
rows.name:
I'll whip you up an extra bit if you like,
since you've already been so helpful.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0408
rows.name:
Hey, what's up? Your appetite left you
speechless? Don't you want to try this
delicious grub?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0409
rows.name: Looks pretty tasty, doesn't it?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0410
rows.name:
The smell's irresistible, isn't it?
Melt in your mouth, that will.
I bet you're dying for a bite, right?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0411
rows.name: How will you respond?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0412
rows.name: Say you'd like to try it sometime

rows.label: qst001301_msg0413
rows.name: Say you never want to eat it

rows.label: qst001301_msg0414
rows.name:
Ah! I knew it! Well, I wouldn't dream of
not giving you a taste of this gourmet
cuisine.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0415
rows.name:
Hehehe... I'll stew yours in the oily
juices a little longer to make sure
it's packed full of froggy flavor!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0416
rows.name: Uh... All right, then?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0417
rows.name:
That's mighty odd... Who wouldn't
love my famous Salted Brog Sauté?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0418
rows.name:
I was going to give you a year's supply
as your payment, actually. Maybe I'd
best come up with a different reward.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0419
rows.name: Anyway, let's focus on the task at hand.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0420
rows.name: Can you deliver this to Svandin for me?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0421
rows.name:
You'll find him at the Invidian barracks
near Fons Maim Port.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0422
rows.name: Thanks again!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0501
rows.name:
Huh? Not too sure where you're
supposed to go, are you?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0502
rows.name:
You'll find Svandin at the Invidian
barracks near Fons Maim Port.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0503
rows.name:
Thanks a lot for taking care
of that for me.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0601
rows.name:
Good to see you again! Looks like you
managed to take care of that delivery.
That's a real big help!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0602
rows.name:
Thanks to you lot, I'm going to be able
to get my business back on its feet!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0603
rows.name: Now as for your compensation...

rows.label: qst001301_msg0604
rows.name:
I'd like to give you one of our
super-secret recipes.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0605
rows.name:
Salted Brog Sauté! What did you
think it was going to be?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0606
rows.name:
I was in deep trouble there, and you
helped me out. So I wanted to give you
something really special.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0607
rows.name:
It's my great grandpa's recipe, but I'm
sure he wouldn't mind me giving it to
you, considering the circumstances.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0608
rows.name:
Hey, you're looking a bit green round
the gills. Are you feeling okay?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0609
rows.name:
Haven't been working yourself sick,
have you?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0610
rows.name:
Nothing a nice big bowl of Salted Brog
Sauté won't fix!
